## Advanced UI Components

**Phase:** Phase 2 - User Experience & Polish
**Timeline:** 6-8 weeks
**Section:** 2.3

### Goal
Deliver exceptional user experience with mobile optimization and accessibility

### Impact
Improves perceived performance and usability

### Effort Estimate
2 weeks

### Priority
P2

### Tasks

- [ ] Implement virtualized lists for large libraries (1000+ items)
- [ ] Add drag-and-drop playlist reordering
- [ ] Create rich audio visualizations
- [ ] Implement progressive image loading with blurhash
- [ ] Add contextual menus (right-click support)
- [ ] Implement keyboard shortcuts modal

### Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] All tasks completed
- [ ] Code reviewed and approved
- [ ] Tests passing (unit + integration)
- [ ] Documentation updated
- [ ] No regressions in existing functionality
